          <title>
            <string language="et">Värvi asjad</string>
            <string language="en">Paint the objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Malen Sie die Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Peignez les objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pinte os objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vernici gli oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρωματίστε τα αντικείμενα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pinte los objetos</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Programmiga Kidspiration loodud tööleht, kus on vaja värvida ja ära tunda liiklusvahendeid, ümmargusi ja kandilisi asju.</string>
            <string language="en">Kidspiration worksheet, where children have to recognize and colour vehicles, round and square objects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Matemaatika</string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kidspiration Bogen, wo Kinder erkennen müssen 
und Farbe Träger-, runde und quadratischenachrichten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau de Kidspiration, où les enfants doivent 
reconnaître et les objets de véhicules de couleur, ronds et carrés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha de Kidspiration, onde as crianças têm que 
reconhecer e os objetos dos veículos da cor, os redondos e os 
quadrados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro di Kidspiration, dove i bambini 
devono riconoscere ed oggetti rotondi e quadrati dei veicoli di 
colore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας Kidspiration, όπου τα παιδιά πρέπει
να αναγνωρίσουν και να χρωματίσουν τα οχήματα, τα στρογγυλά και 
τετραγωνικά αντικείμενα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hoja de trabajo de Kidspiration, donde los niños
tienen que reconocer y los objetos de los vehículos del color, 
redondos y cuadrados.</string>
          </description>
